Name: Denny & Eleni
Ingredients: 5 ml Torabhaig Peated Single Malt Whisky
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Review: Named after Denny Kallivoka and Eleni Nikoloulia, our favourite Greek drinks writers, this whisky based cocktail has a healthy glug of mastiha with birch water. It finishes with liquorice and Islay whisky.
History: Created in August 2015 by yours truly (Simon Difford) at the Cabinet Room, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Denny & Eleni contains 171 calories
